about_the_game:
Looks almost the same as real vodka, but actually is just tap water! What a great way to save some money and your health!

Gives Igor a bottle of alcohol free vodka he can drink instead of his 50% alc regular one.

content_descriptors.notes:
-Alcohol misuse. Game does not encourage to it though.
-Some violence, including shooting with firearms and some self-harm.

detailed_description:
Looks almost the same as real vodka, but actually is just tap water! What a great way to save some money and your health!

Gives Igor a bottle of alcohol free vodka he can drink instead of his 50% alc regular one.
name: The Real Man Summer Championship 2019 - Alcohol Free Vodka

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Win 7/8.1/10 (64Bit)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz dual core processor or higher.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 560 GTX or Radeon R7 260x series or higher.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10 (64Bit)
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz multi core processor or higher.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 760 GTX or Radeon R9 280X series or higher.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Looks almost the same as real vodka, but actually is just tap water! What a great way to save some money and your health!
